nodes.text: This luminous orange and blue-colored flower was a plant that had a psychotropic side effect on ecorbs when eaten, generating a giddy sensation and producing nightmares of disembodied eyes and bloody teeth. Eating too many flowers would make the ecorb very sick and sprout shell-like hampas.

This flower was featured in a story in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
